name: General Issue
about: Share feedback, report a bug, or request an improvement
title: "[Issue] "
labels: []
assignees: []
---

## Summary

Clearly describe the problem, idea, or request.

## Details

Include any relevant context, logs, screenshots, or references that help explain the issue.

## Impact

How does this affect your work or the community? What is the severity or priority from your perspective?

## Suggested Solution (optional)

If you have thoughts on how this could be addressed, outline them here.
